name: Home Repairs
about: Assist with daily household tasks such as cleaning, laundry, ironing, and garden maintenance

name: Cleaning and Organization
about: Skilled in home repairs and renovations, ready to help with painting, furniture repairs, and electrical installations.

name: Shopping and Delivery
about: Available to help with the delivery and pickup of items, documents, or packages from various locations as requested.

name: Beauty and Wellness
about: Provide beauty and personal care services such as haircuts, massages, facials, and manicures/pedicures.

name: Childcare Services
about: Offer pickup services for children from school or extracurricular activities, along with supervision and assistance with homework.

name: Food Preparation
about: Provide catering or food delivery services for special events, as well as preparing healthy meals or meal prepping.

name: Administrative Support
about: Skilled in administrative tasks such as document filing, time management, writing, and content editing.

name: Healthcare Services
about: Offer companionship and care for patients in need of assistance during hospital visits, elderly care, and post-operative recovery.
